item.title: NEMO add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "for me, the imagination which so often kept me awake and in terror as a child has seen me through some terrible bouts of stark raving reality as an adult." -- Stephen King

item.title: NEMO add a quote by Wanda Sykes
item.description: "white criminals commit the biggest crimes.a brother might rob a bank. a white man will rob a pension fund. the brother is going to get ten to fifteen years because he had a gun. the white guy is going to get a congressional hearing because he had a job and a nice suit." -- Wanda Sykes

item.title: NEMO add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "All the war-propaganda, all the screaming and lies and hatred, comes invariably from people who are not fighting." -- George Orwell

item.title: NEMO add a quote by Emma Goldman
item.description: "The most unpardonable sin in society is independence of thought." -- Emma Goldman

item.title: NEMO add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The Electric Monk was a labour-saving device, like a dishwasher or a video recorder... Electric Monks believed things for you, thus saving you what was becoming an increasingly onerous task, that of believing all the things the world expected you to believe." -- Douglas Adams
